definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: The design of the planetary indexing cam mechanism is put forward for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 本文首次提出了一種行星分度凸輪機構的設計構想。

sentences.english: An automatic dividing punch mould for wheel crane spoke is described.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種輪式起重機輪輻自動分度衝孔模。

sentences.english: Globoid cam indexing mechanism is used widely in modern automatic machines.
sentences.chinese: 弧面凸輪分度機構廣泛應用於現代自動機械。

sentences.english: This paper carried out a deep discussion on seriation design of cam indexing mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 對凸輪分度機構系列化設計進行了探討。

sentences.english: This paper deals with practical machining methods for index cylindrical cam.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論了圓柱蝸形分度凸輪的實用加工方法。

sentences.english: The fastening tool further includes a coil feeder (720) assembly having an indexing pawl (722).
sentences.chinese: 緊固工具還包括具有分度棘爪的卷料進給組件。

sentences.english: If you think in minutes rather than inches, adjustments can be made easily.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想在分度替代英寸，可以做出簡單調整。

sentences.english: Fusions were evaluated by independent observers using a published 4-point scale.
sentences.chinese: 融合由不同觀察者使用一種已發表的4分分度法評估。

sentences.english: This is a company specializing in the production of precision cam intermittent sub-degree institutions.
sentences.chinese: 本公司是一家專業生產精密凸輪間歇分度機構。

sentences.english: The middle group of castings are the parts for the Gingery dividing head and tailstock.
sentences.chinese: 鑄件中的小組是爲金格里分度頭和尾架的部分。

sentences.english: Where should banks turn if they want to find successful brand differentiation to emulate?
sentences.chinese: 那麼銀行如果想把品牌成功做出區分度該怎麼做呢？

sentences.english: This article presents a simple method of figure identifying for image of optical diagraph .
sentences.chinese: 介紹光學分度頭讀數屏數字識別的一種簡單方法。

sentences.english: A new method related to the true temperature has been proposed to calibrate the infrared pyrometers.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種與真溫有關的分度紅外溫度計的新方法。

sentences.english: The total chromium content is measured by improved DPC spectrophotometry.
sentences.chinese: 最後以改進的DPC分光分度法測其總鉻含量。

sentences.english: Derived number of indexing profile is continuous.
The graph will rescale to show the region you selected.
sentences.chinese: 曲線圖將重新分度以顯示你所選的區域。

definition: worm-gear pair/worm drive/worm and worm gear
(of opposing teeth, or gears) to mesh/to engage
